infos.value: Yer mean to tell me now that we lost th' entire pursuit force!?
Your soldiers prove more useless by the hour.
Oelde's still making his way north, isn't he?
Then stay put until I arrive. Do yer understand me?
Hmph. A lukewarm strategy, as always.
You're too slow to act. Are you trying to ensure that Oelde and Wezette join forces before we arrive?
I didn't ask for yer opinion, slug!
Sadali gave you an order. You are to do all in your power to help me bring down Oelde.
Surely even you have not forgotten that already?
Tell your men not to halt their pursuit.
...Heed my orders. Don't halt th' pursuit.
Heh heh heh. To think I'd see the day the mighty Muraga loses face to a mere boy.
Settle this business with Oelde, and I'll take care of your little Sterne problem for you. How about that?
And you can keep your coin. It's on me.
